name: ClaimSubmit
title: Submit a Claim resource for adjudication

parameter.name: resource
parameter.documentation: A Claim resource or Bundle of claims, either as individual Claim resources or as Bundles each containing a single Claim plus referenced resources.

parameter.name: return
parameter.documentation: A ClaimResponse resource or Bundle of claim responses, either as individual ClaimResponse resources or as Bundles each containing a single ClaimResponse plus referenced resources.
